seo.title: Gratis ljudguide för Positano
seo.description: Hur du använder vår kostnadsfria ljudguide för promenader i Positano och vad du får med dig.

intro: Download our free Positano audio walk: start at Chiesa Nuova, weave through the old town, and finish on Spiaggia Grande.
Follow the route and listening tips below, and save the files over Wi-Fi before you step outside.

sections.title: Route
body: Start at the Chiesa Nuova bus stop → pause at the Via Pasitea viewpoints → wind through the alleys → arrive at Spiaggia Grande.
Take your time on terraces, but stay mindful of locals and porters using the staircases for deliveries.

sections.title: How to listen
body: Download the audio on hostel Wi-Fi or stream at known hotspots along the route.
Keep volume low on stairs and pop one earbud out when crossing roads or passing other walkers.

a: Yes — expect stairs. Reverse the loop or use the SITA bus uphill if your knees need a break.
